mapper.insert: insert into quan_kline (id, exchange_id, symbol, period, size, high, open, low, close, count, amount, vol, ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{high,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{open,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{low,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{close,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{count,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, symbol, period, size, high, open, low, close, count, amount, vol, ts from quan_kline
